programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Action thriller. Dangerous convict Jack Conrad, awaiting execution for crimes he did not commit, is bought by a television producer and taken to a deserted island in the South Pacific. There he is offered the oportunity to escape Death Row by taking part in a number of fights to the death with other prisoners. Breckel, the corrupt producer, plans to broadcast the illegal tournament live over the internet, but there could be more to Jack than meets the eye(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Kyle Patrick Alvarez's drama The Stanford Prison Experiment is based on real events. Dr. Philip Zimbardo (Billy Cruddup) arranges for 24 volunteers to be either guards or inmates a makeshift prison system so that he can observe how their behavior changes. Eventually those playing guards become abusive and dictatorial, while the inmates band together to survive the harsh conditions. What the Stanford professor doesn't expect is that he and the people running the experiment are also being transformed by taking part in it. The Stanford Prison Experiment screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration in this powerful drama(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: This action drama puts a new spin on Shaft, one of the key "blaxploitation" films of the 1970s. John Shaft (Samuel L. Jackson), the namesake nephew of the legendary private eye (Richard Roundtree), is a street-smart police detective who with his partner Carmen Velez (Vanessa L. Williams) has been assigned to a racially motivated murder case, in which a black college student was killed in front of a restaurant by Walter Williams Jr. (Christian Bale), the sociopathic son of a New York construction tycoon, who then fled the country rather than face prosecution. Diane Palmieri (Toni Collette), a waitress on a smoke break, saw the murder, but she doesn't want to talk to the police. Two years later, Walter is forced to return to New York, but without Diane's testimony, the city doesn't have much of a case. Soon, Shaft, Walter Junior, and Walter Senior's goons are all looking for Diane, with Junior enlisting the help of Peoples Hernandez (Jeffrey Wright), a small-time drug dealer who will do anything to move into the big leagues. Shaft and Carmen find Diane, but discover that she had a good reason for being on the lam for the past two years. Amidst all this activity, John gets frequent advice from his uncle, with whom he ponders the idea of quitting the force and opening a detective agency. Shaft was directed by John Singleton, from a screenplay by Singleton, Richard Price, and Shane Salerno

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Omit the Logic
programme.desc: A biography of the pioneering comedian Richard Pryor that features interviews with family members who describe his often difficult life as well as sit-downs with modern-day comics who explain the influence Pryor's unique style had on them

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan kicks up the action and thrills in this espionage adventure. Chan plays nerdy Hong Kong sporting-goods salesman Buck Yuen, who's drawn into a global adventure involving his long-estranged father, spies and a biological weapon. Eric Tsang, Vivian Hsu, Kim Min-jeong

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When Mystery, Alaska's little-known, amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population of this small town must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their town becomes the center of a nationally televised event(r)

programme.title: The One I Wrote for You
programme.desc: After taking a job in a coffee shop to make ends meet, a struggling musician's young daughter enters him in a song-writing competition(r)

programme.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
programme.desc: A frustrated composer finds his calling in teaching while raising a hearing-impaired son(r)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A young couple on a weekend camping trip into the wilderness wage a grueling struggle for survival in this visceral thriller from Canada. Jenn (Missy Peregrym) is a high-powered executive whose cellphone is never out of reach. Determined to salvage their troubled relationship, Jenn's boyfriend Alex (Jeff Roop) takes them to a secluded campsite near a scenic lake where he used to play as a child. After popping their tent, the couple are settling in when lone hiker Brad (Eric Balfour) appears out of nowhere, and joins them for dinner. The fire dimming later that evening, however, Brad departs, leaving Jenn and Alex to prepare for their long hike the following day. Setting out bright and early, the couple make their way ever deeper into the sprawling forest, only realizing they're hopelessly lost once darkness begins to fall. Meanwhile, their nightmare has only just begun, because many dangers dwell in the forest, and they're about to face the worst one imaginable

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A skilled medieval warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: In 1856, a slave and his family escape from the plantation they have been forced to call home for two generations. They are guided by the Underground Railway towards Canada, but are pursued by a relentless slave hunter

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett and Tubbs, two Miami detectives, try to stop a global drug trade, making their job extremely dangerous work

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Crime drama by director Quentin Tarantino, whose Oscar-winning screenplay centres on two hit men

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: The directorial debut from filmmaker James Wan, this psychological thriller comes from the first screenplay by actor Leigh Whannell, who also stars. Whannell plays Adam, one of two men chained up in a mysterious chamber. The other, Dr. Gordon (Cary Elwes), like Adam, has no idea how either of them got there. Neither of them are led to feel optimistic by the man lying between them dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound. Together, Adam and Dr. Gordon attempt to piece together what has happened to them and who the sadistic madman behind their imprisonment is. Also starring Danny Glover and Monica Potter, Saw premiered at the 2004 Sundance Film Festival

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A young couple on a weekend camping trip into the wilderness wage a grueling struggle for survival in this visceral thriller from Canada. Jenn (Missy Peregrym) is a high-powered executive whose cellphone is never out of reach. Determined to salvage their troubled relationship, Jenn's boyfriend Alex (Jeff Roop) takes them to a secluded campsite near a scenic lake where he used to play as a child. After popping their tent, the couple are settling in when lone hiker Brad (Eric Balfour) appears out of nowhere, and joins them for dinner. The fire dimming later that evening, however, Brad departs, leaving Jenn and Alex to prepare for their long hike the following day. Setting out bright and early, the couple make their way ever deeper into the sprawling forest, only realizing they're hopelessly lost once darkness begins to fall. Meanwhile, their nightmare has only just begun, because many dangers dwell in the forest, and they're about to face the worst one imaginable(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of stand-up comics, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher. Also: a sneak peek at the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas(n)

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A writer finds out the hard way about the consequences of walking a fine line between fiction and real life when his friends read about themselves in his debut novel(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: An exploration of the effects of single-parents households through a profile of various men who were raised by single mothers(n)

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A couple on the hunt for Bigfoot get more than they bargained for when they go into the woods to the location of a fabled sighting. Found-footage chiller. Strong language(n)

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Ollie loses his wife, then his top PR job, but stays devoted to his baby girl Gertie. Seven years on, Maya from the video store puts the zest back into his life(n)

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: In this spooky and surreal chiller, an American movie producer (Anastasia Hille) searching for her birth parents inherits a house in Russia that holds dark and dangerous secrets from her past. Directed by Nacho Cerda(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: Andrew Niccol's 21st century war drama Good Kill stars Ethan Hawke as Air Force Major Thomas Egan, a talented pilot who spends his days operating a drone over various terrorist threats in the middle east while sitting in a trailer on a base in Las Vegas. Egan hates not being allowed to fly actual planes anymore, and as the CIA begins dictating orders to Egan and his crew, he begins to feel morally disconnected from his job. This leads to more conflict at home with his wife (January Jones), who wishes her husband could focus on their family as much as his military duty. Good Kill screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Helen Mirren and Julie Walters star in this hit comedy drama, based on a true story. In Yorkshire, 12 Women's Institute ladies decide to pose nude for a charity calendar(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: A Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: A corrupt and violent police officer refuses to adapt and enters a downward spiral(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Segments include a look at the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships; a re-visit to "Friday Night Lights" in Odessa, Texas; and a report on one of the most lucrative deep-sea fishing tournaments in the world

programme.title: War
programme.desc: Action stars Jason Statham and Jet Li pack quite a punch in this full-throttle martial-arts epic. Statham is an FBI agent who goes gunning for the long-thought-dead hitman (Li) who took down his partner three years before. But now, the hired killer is in the middle of an Asian gang war involving the Chinese triad and Japanese yakuza, and all is not as it seems. Directed by Philip G. Atwell. John Lone, Devon Aoki, Saul Rubinek, Ryo Ishibashi

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Crime drama by director Quentin Tarantino, whose Oscar-winning screenplay centres on two hit men

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In this captivating documentary, three climbers ascend Mount Meru and endure numerous challenges while attempting to summit the Shark's Fin, a near-vertical point on the mountain

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Rob Lowe and Bill Paxton star as Frank and Jesse James, who, after the defeat of the South in the Civil War and the pointless murder of their younger brother, seek their own brand of justice. As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches -- and make sworn enemies of lawmen, who are determined to see them dead

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: Set in the near future, this political thriller centres around nuclear brinksmanship between Iraq and America as Udei Hussein threatens to fire his missiles at key cities. U.S President Walter Emerson must tackle the situation but becomes stranded in a roadside diner after a freak snowstorm and is forced to run operations from there. Also featuring Sean Astin and Timothy Hutton

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: Prepare to shake with fear as Bigfoot stalks five friends during a camping trip in the East Texas wilderness

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Brutally authentic war action detailing the covert US mission in Somalia that became a bloodbath. While the troops on the ground struggle to survive an urban siege by thousands of armed militia, the chopper pilots are shot down one by one

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Rob Lowe and Bill Paxton star as Frank and Jesse James, who, after the defeat of the South in the Civil War and the pointless murder of their younger brother, seek their own brand of justice. As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches -- and make sworn enemies of lawmen, who are determined to see them dead

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: Asian samurai Yang (Korean superstar Jang Dong-gun) has a change of heart after slaughtering his enemy's family, and spares a newborn child. On the run from his master, he heads to America, where he finds a beat-down town that is home to freaks, circus performers, an old drunk (Geoffrey Rush), and a knife-thrower (Kate Bosworth). This spunky love interest soon becomes the student, with the wandering warrior passing along his knowledge so that she can enact revenge against scarred scumbag The Colonel (Danny Huston). As the master tracks the sound of the warrior's sword (literally), the samurai makes one final stand with the town to thwart The Colonel and his gang before they burn it all down. Soon enough, cowboys and ninjas meet in a duel to the death -- guns vs. katanas

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: In this provocative and affecting character study, Samuel L. Jackson stars as a righteous Tennessee farmer who finds a beaten harlot (Christina Ricci) outside his house and does everything in his power to return her to the path of righteousness and salvation. Ricci is a revelation as the lust-in-the-dust wanton woman with deep-seated psychological problems. Written and directed by Craig Brewer. The film's title comes from the name of a blues standard by Blind Lemon Jefferson

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Brutally authentic war action detailing the covert US mission in Somalia that became a bloodbath. While the troops on the ground struggle to survive an urban siege by thousands of armed militia, the chopper pilots are shot down one by one

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Kyle Patrick Alvarez's drama The Stanford Prison Experiment is based on real events. Dr. Philip Zimbardo (Billy Cruddup) arranges for 24 volunteers to be either guards or inmates a makeshift prison system so that he can observe how their behavior changes. Eventually those playing guards become abusive and dictatorial, while the inmates band together to survive the harsh conditions. What the Stanford professor doesn't expect is that he and the people running the experiment are also being transformed by taking part in it. The Stanford Prison Experiment screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival

programme.title: State Property 2
programme.desc: Hip-hop mogul Damon Dash wrote, directed, and stars in this hard-hitting examination of life in the criminal underground of a great city. Three different crime bosses are locked in a battle over the drug trade in Philadelphia. New York transplant Dame (Damon Dash) and his umbrella crew command a powerful network that controls the city's dope traffic, but he has two bitter rivals who both oversee competing gangs from behind bars -- Beans (Beanie Siegel), Philly-born leader of the once-dominant ABM Crime Syndicate, and Loco (Noreaga), a slick street hustler from Miami who has the bankroll to finance a powerful operation. As these three men and their underlings scramble for money and power, another player is quietly consolidating his forces and rising up against them. State Property 2: Philly Streets also features supporting performances from Mariah Carey, Ol' Dirty Bastard, Cam'ron, and a handful of other hip-hop and R&B stars(n)

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: The year is 2008 and US President Walter Emerson , is forced to make a monumental decision that will affect world history, in this taut political thriller. Trapped by a freak snowstorm in a tiny mid-American town in Colorado whilst campaigning for re-election, Emerson receives word that Iraqi dictator Uday Hussein has staged a surprise attack on Kuwait. It is the same type of attack which provoked the Gulf War in 1990, but this time Iraq has chemical and biological weapons ready to fire on Israel, Greece and Turkey(n)

programme.title: Turbulence 2: Fear of Flying
programme.desc: A group of people who have completed a therapy program to overcome their severe fear of flying celebrate with a group flight to L.A. However, they soon discover that there are perfectly good reasons to be afraid of airliners -- a group of terrorists highjack the jet, murdering the pilot and threatening to kill all the passengers with chemical weapons. With the captain's chair empty, one of the passengers is forced to bring the plane safely to the ground(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: American special forces commando Frank Dux goes AWOL to compete in the Kumite, a clandestine martial arts contest held in Hong Kong. Action(n)

programme.title: Blown Away
programme.desc: A relationship between two teens (Corey Haim, Nicole Eggert) involves deception and murder. Corey Feldman, Jean Le Clerc. Directed by Brenton Spencer(n)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: In this black comedy about workplace politics of the undead, cubicle dweller Evan (Fran Kranz) starts to worry about his chance for a promotion when it looks like his office has been infiltrated by vampires(n)

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: Genetically created polar bears run amok and terrorize everyone in sight after they are created by a company seeking to take advantage of global warming(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: American special forces commando Frank Dux goes AWOL to compete in the Kumite, a clandestine martial arts contest held in Hong Kong. Action(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Mesmerizing fact-based thriller about the search for the elusive mass murderer known as the Zodiac Killer, who terrorized the San Francisco Bay Area for a number of years in the 1970s. Jake Gyllenhaal plays newspaper political cartoonist Robert Graysmith, upon whose book the script is based. Mark Ruffalo plays Insp. Dave Toschi, who was the inspiration for the title characters in Steve McQueen's "Bullitt" and Clint Eastwood's "Dirty Harry." Robert Downey Jr. Directed by David Fincher(n)

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: An ex-soldier tracks down a fellow veteran of the Bosnian War in search of revenge, leading to a showdown in the Appalachian Mountains(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Adam and Lawrence have been chained up in a filthy bathroom with a corpse lying between them. They are the latest victims of 'Jigsaw', a madman who's twisted games always leave the players dead... or worse. Horror(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Chris (Helen Mirren) and Annie (Julie Walters) are two very different women who live in a small village in the Yorkshire Dales. Their friendship is put to the test just when their relationship needs to be stronger than ever. When Annie's husband dies of leukemia, Chris organizes a campaign to raise funds for the local hospital. Her plan is to produce a calendar featuring photographs of the village women performing their traditional tasks. But the proposal has an original twist: the women will pose in the nude. The pictures are known all across the country and the women become famous

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Six decades after WWII, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) returns to Vienna in order to reclaim family belongings that were once seized by the Nazis in this poignant drama based on a true story. Chief among those items is the Gustav Klimt painting "The Lady in Gold." With the help of her ambitious young lawyer (Ryan Reynolds), the woman takes her fight all the way from Austria to the U.S. Supreme Court

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso
programme.desc: Director Giuseppe Tornatore's Oscar-winning paean to the silver screen recalls a man's childhood in 1940s Sicily amid the magic of his town's cinema

programme.title: Miles to Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: The relationships between musicians and their road crews, and their importance, are explored

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: The first teen to come out of the closet at North Gateway High struggles to balance his newfound popularity with his longtime friendships as the three most popular girls in school all attempt to claim him as their G.B.F. (gay best friend). The moment Tanner (Michael J. Willett) reveals his true sexuality to his classmates he rockets up the social ladder. Suddenly, he's decked out in the latest fashions, and living it up with the in-crowd. Meanwhile, the friends who used to be part of Tanner's inner circle get left out in the cold. Now Tanner will be faced with the most difficult decision of his high school career -- keep riding the popularity train and accept his role as a human fashion accessory, or go back to the people who have always accepted him for who he really is. Megan Mullally, Jonathan Silverman, Rebecca Gayheart, and Natasha Lyonne co-star in a comedy from director Darren Stein

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship is forged between a small community of striking miners in Wales and a team of London-based gay-and-lesbian activists who help fight their cause. With no end to the strike in sight, the urban activists venture into the countryside to deliver their donation in person, and find they have more in common with the people of this struggling community than anyone on either side could have expected

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: After striking up a friendship with a wealthy widow, small-town mortician Bernie goes to desperate measures when he becomes fed up with her incessant nagging. Black comedy

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Business colleagues Les and Natalie are stuck in Albuquerque during a long layover. While Natalie considers cheating on her partner, Les decides to investigate a drunken affair he had the last time he was in the city

programme.title: The Hand that Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Peyton was once a happily married woman, but when her doctor husband is accused of assaulting a patient and he commits suicide, her world falls apart and she plots revenge. Claire, the woman who made the accusation, hires Peyton as a nanny, not knowing of their past involvement. Peyton then proceeds to terrorize the family, attempts to seduce the husband and generally destroy Claire as she feels she has been destroyed

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Mature comedy drama in which a newly unemployed, widowed man manages to stay devoted to his baby girl. Seven years on, a girl from the local video store puts the zest back into his life

programme.title: Man About Town
programme.desc: Ben Affleck stars in this biting satire about a top Hollywood agent whose perfect life comes crashing down when he learns that his beautiful wife (Rebecca Romijn) is cheating on him and his private journal is stolen by a vengeful, would-be screenwriter. John Cleese, Samuel Ball, Gina Gershon, Mike Binder (who also wrote and directed)

programme.title: Happy Endings
programme.desc: The lives of various Los Angelenos are wittily weaved together in this multi-plot character study featuring a stellar ensemble cast led by Lisa Kudrow. She plays a woman who gave up her child for adoption as a teen, and is now being given a chance for a reunion, but with certain strings attached. Jesse Bradford costars as a filmmaker who claims he can get mother and son together. Written and directed by Don Roos. Tom Arnold, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Jason Ritter, Steve Coogan, Laura Dern

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Business colleagues Les and Natalie are stuck in Albuquerque during a long layover. While Natalie considers cheating on her partner, Les decides to investigate a drunken affair he had the last time he was in the city

programme.title: Tart
programme.desc: Cat Storm (Dominique Swain) is a bored high school girl in New York City who follows her petulant, rich friends from one coming-of-age adventure to another. They experiment with cruelty, rudeness, brazenness, and idiocy before moving onto sex and drugs. Cat's best friend, Delilah (Bijou Phillips), is kicked out of school for using cocaine (her father's), forcing Cat to become best friends with Grace (Mischa Barton), who guides her into the arms of William (Brad Renfro), the boy Cat's had a crush on for some time. Eventually they all wind up at a luxurious country estate for a weekend of drugs, passion, and, inevitably, gruesome murder(n)

programme.title: NYC Underground
programme.desc: Rich Manhattan kids head to Brooklyn for a concert, and cross a group of thugs who send them fleeing into the subway system(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: Rachel is a rookie cop ready to begin her first night shift in the local police station of small Scottish, backwater town. However, this is a night she will never forget; for when Six arrives...all hell will break loose, with Rachel caught right in the centre of it(n)

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: A research scientist, his girlfriend and his teenage daughter fight for their lives in the African desert after incurring the wrath of ruthless arms dealers(n)

programme.title: Liberty Stands Still
programme.desc: When his daughter is killed by an illegally purchased firearm during a high school shooting, a normally pacifistic man named Joe (Wesley Snipes) goes off the deep end. Vowing to get even with the gun manufacturer who created the weapon, Joe targets the manufacturer's widow, Liberty Wallace (Linda Fiorento), for a complex scheme of justice and retribution. Armed with a cell phone and a long-range rifle, Joe orders Liberty to handcuff herself to an outdoor hot dog stand, wired with a time bomb. As the clock ticks inexorably closer to the inevitable explosion, the terrified but resourceful Liberty tries to talk her way out of her predicament--a task made virtually impossible by Joe's bizarre "conditions". First screened in America at the 2002 Palm Springs International Film Festival, Liberty Stands Still did not gain a widespread showing until it was picked up for cable broadcast by Cinemax on August 10, 2002(n)

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: A romantic trip to China turns into a lunar nightmare for a pair of happy newlyweds when their taxi driver ditches them in a remote village, and the locals offer them up as sacrifices for the menacing moon creatures that return to Earth annually to replenish their ranks. According to Chinese legend, the dead return to Earth on the seventh month of the lunar year, when the moon glows full in the night sky. America-born Yul (Tim Chiou) and his new wife Melissa (Amy Smart) had just arrived in China to meet Yul's family when their idyllic getaway takes a sudden turn for the worse. When night falls and their tour guide leaves them stranded in a darkened, boarded-up village, Yul and Amy quickly realize that this wasn't a planned stop. Once a year, the lunar creatures return to Earth in search of a sacrifice. Yul and Amy have just been offered up, and now in order to avoid being assimilated into the collective that pursues them through the darkened forest, they will have to survive until the morning light casts the frightful beasts back to the moon for another year(n)

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: An ambitious young female singer moves to New York City in search of stardom, but finds only disappointment until falling for a struggling record-industry executive who helps her down the road to fame. Songwriting duo Gretta (Keira Knightley) and Dave (Adam Levine) had been dating since college when they decided to seek their fortune in NYC. When Dave is signed by a major label, temptation proves too powerful for him to resist and the couple call it quits. Crestfallen, Gretta fights to get back on her feet until one night, while performing in the East Village, she catches the attention of Dan (Mark Ruffalo), a once-respected music executive who's since fallen on hard times. Enchanted by Gretta's powerful voice and skillful songwriting, Dan convinces her to join him in a collaboration that will transform them both over the course of one unforgettable summer. Written and directed by John Carney (Once, Zonad)(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: A group of male friends become obsessed with a family of mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents after one of them commits suicide(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and directed this romantic and heartwarming comedy-drama about a divorcé (Idris Elba) who falls for the lawyer (Gabrielle Union) helping him to win custody of his three young daughters after his ex-wife moves in with a drug dealer. Louis Gossett Jr., Tasha Smith, Tracee Ellis Ross, Malinda Williams(n)

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck pals flee their money troubles in New York for what they hope will be a stress-free vacation in Los Angeles. However, they soon realize their trip will be anything but relaxing when they move in with an eccentric aunt. Jess Weixler, Jennifer Prediger, Megan Mullally, Will Forte and Jeffrey Tambor co-star(n)

programme.title: Up Close & Personal
programme.desc: The world of broadcast news is both the theme and setting for this intense love story. When an ambitious TV weathergirl apprentices under a veteran news anchor, their working relationship develops into romance. Based on a true story. Robert Redford, Michelle Pfeiffer, Stockard Channing, Joe Mantegna, Kate Nelligan, Glenn Plummer, James Rebhorn, Scott Bryce, Dedee Pfeiffer(n)

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: An ambitious young female singer moves to New York City in search of stardom, but finds only disappointment until falling for a struggling record-industry executive who helps her down the road to fame. Songwriting duo Gretta (Keira Knightley) and Dave (Adam Levine) had been dating since college when they decided to seek their fortune in NYC. When Dave is signed by a major label, temptation proves too powerful for him to resist and the couple call it quits. Crestfallen, Gretta fights to get back on her feet until one night, while performing in the East Village, she catches the attention of Dan (Mark Ruffalo), a once-respected music executive who's since fallen on hard times. Enchanted by Gretta's powerful voice and skillful songwriting, Dan convinces her to join him in a collaboration that will transform them both over the course of one unforgettable summer. Written and directed by John Carney (Once, Zonad)(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and directed this romantic and heartwarming comedy-drama about a divorcé (Idris Elba) who falls for the lawyer (Gabrielle Union) helping him to win custody of his three young daughters after his ex-wife moves in with a drug dealer. Louis Gossett Jr., Tasha Smith, Tracee Ellis Ross, Malinda Williams(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: The Search for Peter Kerry. Jessica Fletcher uses her mystery writer's instincts to investigate another case. When the heir to a fortune appears after a 20-year absence, murder and intrigue follow

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Smooth Operators. The 100th episode of Murder She Wrote gets under way when a derelict is found dead in a New York alley. At first glance, it appears that the dead man succumbed to alcoholism, but the other clues--including several conspicuously missing items--don't add up. Jessica Fletcher (Angela Lansbury) teams with ulcerated NYPD lieutenant Hanratty (Barney Martin) to make sense of the case, leading both sleuths to a group of disreputable doctors

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Fire Burn, Caldron Bubble. Jessica investigates some strange occurrences in Cabot Cove involving a woman who has been dead for three hundred years

programme.title: Hart to Hart
programme.desc: The Wayward Hart. Max takes off unannounced, before the Harts discover the cigar they gave him is poisoned. Lionel Stander, Robert Wagner, Stefanie Powers. Big Sam: Amanda Blake. Draper: Lyman Ward

programme.title: Hart to Hart
programme.desc: A Change of Hart. A killer stalking Jonathan waits in the Harts' home with someone she thinks is Max, unaware that the man she's with and the man she's after are one and the same. Robert Wagner, Stefanie Powers. Eve: Julie Newmar. Gates: Perry Lopez. Max: Lionel Stander

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Abduction. Mobsters make Matlock an offer he can't refuse: give them the information a mob lawyer passed to him or Michelle will be fitted for cement shoes. Robert Drake: Michael Russo. Jay Cutler: Raymond Serra. Sgt. Sam Hayden: John Kapelos. Doug Pinter: Lenny Wolpe

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Mr. Awesome. A comic-book artist, whose mom is up for murder, could come to the rescue when Matlock tries to draw out the real killer. Jimmy Johnson: Jordan Christopher Michael. Walt Thomas: Michael McGrady. Lorraine Ortega: Bonnie Burroughs

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Murder, Plain & Simple. In search of a special quilt, Jessica Fletcher takes a trip into Amish country, where her travelling companion, a publishing assistant, is accused of murder

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Tainted Lady. The poisoning deaths of three customers point to the local diner owner

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Ghost. Mike Wilson begs Matlock to help his wife Janice out when she is accused of a crime. Matlock approaches Janice's lawyer, who thinks Matlock is pulling his leg, because Janice is on trial for killing Mike, her own husband

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Class. Matlock talks about his career to a law class at university and the subject of 'the perfect murder' comes up. When student Eddie Price disappears, the university officials fear that Matlock's speech may have incited one of the students to commit a perfect crime

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Singer. Matlock has to stand by his man when his client (Peter Jurasik) tampers with evidence that makes him suspect in a country singer's murder. John Page: Frederic Lehne. Lt. Rutledge: Jason Beghe. Bunny: Mary McMillan

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Mark. When Billy Wheeler comes back to town $250,000 richer having won the lottery, he soon falls for contractor Judy Wilson. Unfortunately, when she takes him and every other partner for a ride, Billy is accused of her murder and Matlock has to try and clear his name

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Juror. Matlock is a juror in the case of a man accused of murdering his wife. Larry Cooper: Michael C. Gwynne. Armstrong: Michael Bofshever. Flores: Julio Oscar Mechoso. Rucker: Gregory Thirloway. Jennifer O'Malley: Susan Walden

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Debt. Matlock's dislike for Leanne's ex-husband Peter only increases when he discovers the motive for his involvement in the murder of his friend and boss

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Revenge. Someone's out to get revenge on Matlock by making him look like a fool. Lorraine Ortego: Bonnie Burroughs. Brad Ramsey: Jordan Williams. Dave Burton: Steve Umberger. Conrad: Clarence Gilyard Jr

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Obsession. Matlock becomes obsessed with a murder case involving a TV star accused of killing a psychiatrist at a rehab clinic. Terry Landis: Geoffrey Lower. Dr. Paul Dodge: Nicholas Pryor. Trisha Page: Vivica A. Fox. Dr. Schoenfeld: Constance Conover. Cliff: Daniel Roebuck. Leanne: Brynn Thayer

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Divorce. Duncan and Clara's marriage, once believed to be idyllic, is now in tatters, but their divorce proceedings look like being nastier still. Meanwhile, a scam artist tries to sue Matlock

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Competition. The apparent suicide of a piano student doesn't ring true to Matlock (Andy Griffith). Sandra Baldwin: Lisa Norman. Michael Baldwin: Andy Stahl. Russ Lewis: Leo Penn. Becky Smith: Kim Walker. Billy: Warren Frost

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Play. The play's the thing when an actress in a theater production is murdered---and the director (Rene Auberjonois) is cast as the killer. Glenda: Deborah Winstead. Jane Dryden: Leslie Wing. Beth Samuels: Amy Parrish. Flora Michaels: Candy Aston. Matlock: Andy Griffith. Billy: Warren Frost

programme.title: Matlock

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: Nathaniel Hawthorne's The Scarlet Letter is re-imagined as a contemporary high school comedy in this tale of a scheming student who plots to give her popularity a boost by painting herself the easiest lay in school. Like most high school kids, Olive Penderghast (Emma Stone) just wants to be popular. So much so than when her best friend, Rhiannon (Aly Michalka), asks Olive how her weekend went, the bored teen decides to whip up a spicy white lie just to make things interesting. But that minor exaggeration begins to take on a life of its own when it reaches the ears of motor-mouth gossip Jesus freak Marianne (Amanda Bynes), and in no time the entire student body is abuzz over unassuming Olive's unrepentant weekend of debauchery. Of course not a word of it is true, but that doesn't stop everyone in school from talking, and an amused Olive from deciding to go with the flow. Playing the role of the hussy to the hilt, the girl who used to be invisible begins dressing provocatively and turning heads in the hallways. The students aren't the only ones taking notice, either; Olive's English teacher, Mr. Griffith (Thomas Haden Church), is concerned that the kind of attention she's receiving isn't healthy for a developing girl, and his wife (Lisa Kudrow), the school guidance counselor, is in full agreement. The only people who seem remotely interested in the truth are Olive's trusting and open-minded parents (Stanley Tucci and Patricia Clarkson). As Olive takes note of the parallels between her own situation and the plight of the Scarlet Letter heroine Hester Prynne, she realizes that she may be able to manipulate her newfound notoriety to give fellow classmate Brandon's (Dan Byrd) popularity a much-needed shot in the arm. Olive never thought her little game could possibly have any negative effect on anyone but herself, but when loose lips start sinking ships all around her, she realizes that it's high time for the truth to come out

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: We Are Your Friends is a romantic drama based around one young DJ's dreams to make it big in the electronic dance music genre. Cole (Zac Efron), who dreams about becoming a big player in the music industry, meets James (Wes Bentley), a more established disc jockey who takes him under his wing. After some time, Cole begins to develop feelings for Sophie (Emily Ratajkowski), who is dating James. Eventually, Cole must make some hard choices about his career as he moves close to Sophie, causing a fracture in the relationship between James and himself. The film co-stars Jon Bernthal (The Walking Dead), and is the first film directed by Max Joseph

Cruella is the boss of kind fashion designer Anita, who, inspired by her Dalmatians, starts working up a design for a coat made with spotted fur. Cruella likes so much the idea that decides to make the garment out of real Dalmatians. But where to get the animals? programme.desc: A look at "Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie," a 2016 adaptation of the popular British sitcom about hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy, who flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher(n)

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman star as two terminally ill cancer patients who decide to break out of the hospital and live their last days to the fullest in director Rob Reiner's seriocomic road movie. Edward Cole (Nicholson) is a corporate billionaire who is currently sharing a hospital room with blue-collar mechanic Carter Chambers (Freeman). Though initially the pair seems to have nothing in common, conversation gradually reveals that both men have a long list of goals they wish to accomplish before they kick the bucket, and an unrealized desire to discover what kind of men they really are. But one can't accomplish such lofty objectives from the confines of a hospital bed, so now, in order to live their lives to the absolute fullest, Edward and Carter will have to make a break for it. With a checklist that includes playing the poker tables in Monte Carlo, consuming copious amounts of caviar, racing the fastest machines on four wheels, and much more, these two terminally ill men will do their best to fit a lifetime of experience into their last remaining days while forging an unlikely, but truly remarkable, friendship(n)

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The delightfully hilarious gang from The Peanuts returns after 35 years for their silver screen debut. Join Charlie Brown, Lucy, Linus and friends on a new epic adventure while Snoopy tracks down his nemesis, the Red Baron. Charles M. Schulz's iconic characters are brought to life in state of the art 3D animation from Blue Sky Studios, the creators of the Ice Age films. Directed by Steve Martino. Screenwriters include Craig Schulz, one of Charles M. Schulz's sons and Bryan Schulz, Craig's son and Cornelius Uliano(n)

When an intrepid student reporter writes an unflattering article about him, the young man sets out to prove her wrong, falling in love with her along the way

programme.title: Play It to the Bone

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: Georgia (Nia Vardalos) came to Greece to follow a man. A few years later, she's been cast aside -- alone and adrift in a foreign land. Eventually, her passion for history leads her to a job as a tour guide. But Georgia is bored, and has lost her "kefi" (Greek for mojo) to boot. When taciturn sasquatch Poupi (Alexis Georgoulis) replaces the regular driver at the last minute, the frazzled tour guide thinks that her luck has just hit rock bottom. Thankfully, Georgia's latest batch of tourists is a more lively bunch than she's anticipated, and in between bouts with rival tour guide Nico (Alistair McGowan), she manages to form a genuine connection with wisecracking widower Irv (Richard Dreyfuss), a solo vacationer who maintains a jovial facade despite the fact that he misses his late wife dearly. With a little help from Irv, Georgia comes to realize that true love may be closer than she thinks -- if she could just recapture her kefi and open her eyes

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: After forays into film noir, thrillers, dramas, and even documentaries, director John Dahl tries the teen horror genre on for size. Paul Walker stars as Lewis Thomas, a college freshman embarking on a cross-country road trip during summer break to pick up his girlfriend Venna (Leelee Sobieski). Along for the ride is Lewis' brother Fuller (Steve Zahn), a practical joker who uses the car's CB radio to play a cruel prank on a lonely trucker known only by the handle Rusty Nail. The victim of Fuller's gag turns out to be a psychotic murderer and soon the brothers are being pursued by the relentless stalker, who gets his revenge in gruesome fashion. Joy Ride, which co-stars Matthew Kimbrough, was produced under the working title "Squelch."(n)

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns

programme.desc: This exciting animated adventure follows a young man named Manolo on a journey across three enchanting realms, where he faces his greatest fears and learns to follow his heart and embrace his future(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Young wizard-in-training Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) returns to Hogwarts for his fifth year of studies, only to find that the magical community seems to be in a curious state of denial about his recent encounter with the sinister Lord Voldemort (Ralph Fiennes) in the fifth installment of the popular fantasy film series based on the best-selling books by author J.K. Rowling. Rumor has it that the dreaded Lord Voldemort has returned, but Minister for Magic Cornelius Fudge (Robert Hardy) isn't so sure what to make of all the hearsay currently floating around the campus of Hogwarts. Suspecting that Headmaster Albus Dumbledore (Michael Gambon) may be fueling the rumors regarding Voldemort's return in order to undermine his authority and lay claim to his job, Fudge entrusts newly arrived Defense Against the Dark Arts professor Dolores Umbridge (Imelda Staunton) with the task of tracking Dumbledore and keeping a protective watch over the nervous student body. The young wizards of Hogwarts will need something much more effective than Umbridge's Ministry-approved course in defensive magic if they are to truly succeed in the extraordinary battle that lies ahead, however, and when the administration fails to provide the students with the tools that they will need to defend Hogwarts against the fearsome powers of the Dark Arts, Hermione (Emma Watson), Ron (Rupert Grint), and Harry take it upon themselves to recruit a small group of students to form "Dumbledore's Army" in preparation for the ultimate supernatural showdown(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle(n)

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: John Waters does a quirky spin on '50s nostalgia in Cry-Baby, his musical homage to Rebel Without a Cause and +Romeo and Juliet. Set in Baltimore in 1954 at the birth of rock & roll, the film features Johnny Depp as Wade "Cry-Baby" Walker. Depp is pure charisma as a juvenile delinquent with a permanent tear slithering down his cheek, a reminder of his state-executed parents. In the depths of his despair appears goody-goody girl Allison (Amy Locane), who has a sexual crush on Cry-Baby. But Allison's Pat Boone-like boyfriend, Baldwin (Stephen E. Miller), the leader of the squares, is dead set against Cry-Baby and the rest of the juvenile delinquents and leads a revolt against them. In the resultant riot, the juvenile delinquents are blamed for the chaos, and Cry-Baby finds himself dispatched to reform school

programme.title: Connie and Carla
programme.desc: Nia Vardalos ("My Big Fat Greek Wedding") wrote and stars in this cheery musical farce. She and Toni Collette play two struggling Chicago singers who pose as drag performers in L.A. after they witness a mob hit in Chicago. David Duchovny, Stephen Spinella, Alec Mapa

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Real-life siblings Beau and Jeff Bridges star as the eponymous Fabulous Baker Boys. Musical prodigies both, the Bakers have long been teamed as a twin-piano act, with the less talented Frank (Beau Bridges) coasting on the skills of his brilliant younger brother, Jack (Jeff Bridges). Their career dwindling to nickel-and-dime dates in second-rate clubs, the Bakers decide that they need a female vocalist to boost their popularity. They select auditioner Susie Diamond (Michelle Pfeiffer), who in addition to being a gifted songstress is drop-dead gorgeous. The newly renovated Baker Boys act scores a success, which is inevitably threatened by Susie's growing popularity and by Jack's insistence upon pursuing an affair with the girl(n)

programme.title: Thunderstruck
programme.desc: A bumbling teenage basketball fan magically steals the skills of his sports idol during a free-throw competition, and he must restore them to the pro player in time for the play-offs(n)

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name(n)

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: The first film by Duncan Tucker, Transamerica stars Felicity Huffman as a pre-operative transsexual named Bree (whose given name was Stanley). One week before going under the knife, Bree learns that she fathered a boy who is now 17 and is in trouble with the law. Bree would like to ignore this information, but is forced to meet the young man, Toby (played by Kevin Zegers), by her analyst Margaret (Elizabeth Peña), who will not allow the surgery to happen unless Bree meets him and confronts this aspect of her past. Upon meeting, the son believes that Bree is simply a do-gooder. She buys a car and the two road-trip back to her home in Los Angeles, Bree all the while attempting to keep from Toby the truth of the situation(n)

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: "Police Academy" meets "Animal House" in this raucous romp written by and starring the Broken Lizard comedy troupe. Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Paul Soter, Steve Lemme and Erik Stolhanske play Vermont state police officers battling crime and sparring with the local cops, who are trying to get them ousted. Lynda Carter, Daniel von Bargen. Chandrasekhar also directed(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Spy'
programme.desc: A look at "Spy," a 2015 comedy about a CIA analyst thrust into the line of duty to track down a ruthless arms dealer. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne, and is written and directed by Paul Feig(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube stars in this comedy-drama about a day in the life of those who work and chill at a barbershop on Chicago's South Side. Cedric the Entertainer stars as an opinionated barber who spends more time cracking jokes than cutting hair(n)

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
programme.desc: In September 2004, comedian Dave Chappelle took a break from his immensely successful Comedy Central show to stage a free, unpublicized, all-star hip-hop concert in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. Inviting fans over the Internet, on the street, and even in his family's hometown of Yellow Springs, OH, Chappelle asked filmmaker Michel Gondry to document the event from its inception on through to the performances themselves. The result is Dave Chappelle's Block Party, a concert film that provides not only a sampling of the music on display that September, but also an intimate look at the comedian himself. Gondry's cameras tag along with Chappelle as he visits Ohio, recruits a university marching band to play at the show, and surveys the opinions of Clinton Hill on the show that's about to take place. Along the way, we're introduced to some the comedian's favorite acts, in rehearsals and on-stage: Dead Prez, Jill Scott, Mos Def, the Roots, Erykah Badu, Kanye West, and the surprise reuniting of the Fugees(n)

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: (1999) Based on Ted Hughes' book, Brad Bird's animation opens in 1957 in Maine, with the landing of the Iron Giant. Snacking his way through a village on TV antennas and cars, he finds a power plant which promises a more substantial meal. Which is where young Hogarth Hughes (voiced by Eli Marienthal) finds him and saves him from electrocution. Now all Hogarth has to do is hide the Iron Giant from his mother Annie (Jennifer Aniston) and the authorities who, with the Cold War at its height, determine that the massive being is a threat that must be destroyed all costs. Her masterplan is to capture Lerigot, a kindly wizard with fantastical powers whom she intends to use to release Maligore, a hideous molten monster. Only the heroic Power Rangers stand in her way(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms

programme.title: Dirty Driving: Thundercars of Indiana
programme.desc: Documentarian Jon Alpert visits Anderson, Ind., where residents who are still reeling from the closing of a once-thriving General Motors factory seek distraction from a struggling economy in auto racing at the local speedway on Friday nights

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: A Bengali family tries to acclimate to life in the U.S. in this poignant and bittersweet saga of cultures clashing across generations. Their teenage son (Kal Penn) does not embrace their Indian heritage until he visits Calcutta, where he gains an understanding of the importance of his family's past. Indian-born Mira Nair directed from a script by Sooni Taraporevala, who adapted Pulitzer Prize-winner Jhumpa Lahiri's novel. Bollywood superstar Tabu costars as Penn's old-world mother

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: This gritty, highly intense fact-based crime drama tells the sordid tale of a group of drug dealers who kidnap the teenage brother (Anton Yelchin) of a client (Ben Foster) who owes them money and refuses to pay. At first the hostage is treated like their guest, but soon things spiral out of control and a pivotal decision about his fate must be reached. The outstanding young cast is led by Justin Timberlake, Emile Hirsch and Shawn Hatosy. Bruce Willis and Sharon Stone are also featured

John Corbett, Ian Nelson, and Kristin Chenoweth co-star

programme.title: Vice Principals

programme.desc: A raunchy yet heartfelt comedy from director Judd Apatow about Amy (Amy Schumer), a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City, who must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A former British Special Forces agent now delivers cargo, no questions asked, in the south of France, but soon finds himself mixed up in a slave-trade ring

programme.desc: Dana Carvey stars as a PI who loses his memory prior to testifying against a mob boss(n)

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: Writer/director Mike Cahill's drama I Origins centers on medical student Ian Gray (Michael Pitt). Ian specializes in the evolution of the human eye. One day he attends a party where he meets a masked woman whose eyes transfix him, and soon the two fall in love. Years later, Ian makes a startling discovery in the lab, forcing him on a trek across the globe in order to uncover profound truths about mankind. I Origins screened at the 2014 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: Involving, noirish thriller featuring a winning chemistry between Hugh Jackman and Ewan McGregor. Jackman plays a smooth-talking lawyer who introduces McGregor's shy corporate accountant to the wild world of a secretive sex club known as The List, whose motto is "no rough stuff and no names." Unfortunately, McGregor's involvement leads him into a maelstrom of double-crosses, intrigue and murder. Michelle Williams. Directed by Marcel Langenegger. Jackman is also one of the film's producers(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a massive earthquake devastates California(n)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Edward is recruited by a shadowy society at college and rises through the Cold War ranks to become a CIA spymaster. Intricate espionage thriller, only De Niro's second film as director(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a massive earthquake devastates California(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Tight-knit gang of street racers battle a new nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists

The film is also a poignant salute to the resilience of New York City in the aftermath of Sept. 11. The strong supporting cast includes Barry Pepper, Rosario Dawson, Philip Seymour Hoffman and ex-football star Tony Siragusa

programme.title: State of Play

programme.desc: A black yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra-hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a cool young mail clerk on how to approach her

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A special episode offering a comprehensive portrait of the International Olympic Committee, its impact on international competition and its power and influence. Also: a look at the IOC's role in the turmoil surrounding the games in Rio

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Dowdy diner waitress Frankie is courted by short-order cook Johnny, who is determined to win her over by any means necessary

programme.title: Phil Spector
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as legendary music producer Phil Spector in this compelling film exploring Spector's relationship with his attorney (Helen Mirren) during his first trial for murder

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Powerful crime drama about a petty criminal who is released after five years in prison when his corrupt lawyer exploits a legal technicality. Carlito is determined to go straight, but he agrees to take part in a lucrative shady business deal at his attorney's instigation - figuring to discharge the debt of gratitude he owes. Despite his intentions, he finds himself relentlessly drawn back into the world he sought to escape

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: A bank robbery in Brooklyn goes wrong and evolves into a protracted hostage situation, turning the plan's mastermind into a media celebrity and the event into a media circus. Based on a true story

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Tony Montana, an exiled Cuban criminal who goes to work for Miami drug lord Robert Loggia. Montana rises to the top of Florida's crime chain, appropriating Loggia's cokehead mistress (Michelle Pfeiffer) in the process. Howard Hawks' "X Marks the Spot" motif in depicting the story line's many murders is dispensed with in the 1983 Scarface; instead, we are inundated with blood by the bucketful, especially in the now-infamous buzz saw scene. One carry-over from the original Scarface is Tony Montana's incestuous yearnings for his sister Gina (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio). The screenplay for the 1983 Scarface was written by Oliver Stone

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Driven by an extravagant, tour-de-force performance by Al Pacino, Scent of a Woman is the story of Frank Slade (Pacino), a blind, retired army colonel who hires Charlie Simms (Chris O'Donnell), a poor college student on the verge of expulsion, to take care of him over Thanksgiving weekend. At the beginning of the weekend, Frank takes Charlie to New York, where he reveals to the student that he intends to visit his family, have a few terrific meals, sleep with a beautiful woman and, finally, commit suicide. The film follows the mis-matched pair over the course of the weekend, as they learn about life through their series of adventures. Though the story is a little contrived and predictable, it pulls all the right strings, thanks to O'Donnell's sympathetic supporting role and Pacino's powerful lead performance, for which he won his first Academy Award. Scent of a Woman is based on the 1975 Italian film Profumo Di Donna

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: Jaded cop Frank trawls the lonely hearts column for clues to identify a serial killer preying on lovesick single men. Then he places his own advert, hoping to flush the killer out. Excellent crime thriller

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Suspenseful tale of the rivalry between two Victorian-era magicians and their dangerous obsession with outdoing each other. Their feud eventually centers on a trick in which the men appear to teleport across the stage, but neither one is willing to reveal the secret of how it is accomplished. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Millions
programme.desc: Two brothers who recently lost their mother discover a cache of money and ponder what to do with their new windfall. Charming and moving. Alexander Nathan Etel, Lewis Owen McGibbon. Danny Boyle directed. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Melinda and Melinda
programme.desc: Woody Allen's clever comedy is about two playwrights who conceive two different stories about a neurotic New Yorker named Melinda (Radha Mitchell), who's just come out of a bad relationship. Wallace Shawn, Will Ferrell. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Goats
programme.desc: A pot-smoking teen raised by his New Age mother and a marijuana-growing goat herder enrolls in the same East Coast prep school his absentee father once attended, and has difficulty fitting in despite his high GPA and athletic prowess. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: An idealistic German prosecutor becomes interested in the case of a schoolteacher who once worked at Auschwitz. In time, the prosecutor attempts to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Dances With Wolves

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse

programme.title: Big Trouble

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally. (cc)

programme.title: Brüno
programme.desc: Trickster Sacha Baron Cohen offers yet another stinging dose of satire in this comedy that finds him assuming the persona of gay fashionmonger Bruno, the self-proclaimed "voice of Austrian youth TV." Originally conceived as part of the cult TV series "Da Ali G Show," the character of Bruno offers Cohen the opportunity to highlight the absurdities of homophobia and the fashion industry by interviewing celebrities, politicians and haute-couture hangers-on. (cc)

programme.desc: Double bill. Billy promises to have Spencer's back in a kung fu battle against Kleet. Then, Billy's ectoplasm brings a bubble gum bubble to life.

programme.desc: Double bill. Coop follows Kat as he sneaks to the vets to destroy X-rays of himself. When Coop's new radio-controlled rescue helicopter suffers the same fate as his father's childhood toy, he becomes determines to recover both gadgets.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat

programme.desc: With Old Man McGucket's help, the kids discover there is a secret society in Gravity Falls.

programme.desc: Time traveller Blendin Blandin faces off with Dipper and Mabel in a futuristic battle that could trap them for ever in `time jail'.

programme.desc: When Soos finds himself in need of a date for his cousin Reggie's engagement party, he looks to a dating simulator game to help him talk to girls.
